Start: ^I step out into the gardens. its rather cold out tonight.
^There isn't a single star in sky tonight.
StoneGiant: ^I don't really have a reason to be strolling out here at this time of night, but I feels nice being out here with the fireflies.
^Walking around the beaten path, I spot an unusual sight.
^It's Isaac, sitting in a little hidden patch of grass, staring up at the sky.
^He is almost motionless, like a stone giant silently protecting the guardians.
^He is, however, noticeably perturbed. @I walk over to see how he's doing.
TryAgain: ^I go to where I know Isaac is hiding, to talk to him about what is bothering him.
Quiet: ^] "I don't usually see you out here."

b: ^Hiding? why would he be hiding from out here?

c: ^] "Oh! um, want to be left alone then?"
^] "Do you.. want to talk about it?"

b: ^He looks apprehensive, like he wants to talk, but doesn't feel comfortable enough. Maybe he doesn't trust me enough?

PullingTeeth: ^Whether I am or not, I’m still leaving

c: ^] "Whether I am or not, I’m still leaving."

PoorGrip: ^] "when...@ if you don't mind me asking,@ are you leaving, Isaac?"
^"I... try not to think about it..."
OpenAnswer: ^Isaac seems to appreciate my answer. @Your answer has helped improved your Awareness mildly.

Talkative: ^"...Does your life feel like its moving too fast for you?"
^"Do, uh, do you feel that way too?"
^After a few quiet seconds, Isaac nods, slightly.
^I don't really recall seeing Isaac until he and Eduardo we dating, some six months ago.

c: ^] "You've only been here about six months right?"
^probably not been here just 6 months. maybe he got here soon after I did?
^] "You've only been here about a year right?"
^I know how long he's been here, because he's told me.
^] "You've been here for almost 2 and a half years, haven't you?"
^Isaac nods. not even a little shocked I guessed it correctly.
^he does smirk for a split second however, so maybe he appreciates that i knew?

b: ^Jeez! what's been keeping him here this long?
^I spent 5 years in a literal psych ward, and I'm getting out after only a year.

g-0: ^"...Sorry I'm bad.... At speaking.... that is."
^"...People think I'm either... @...some Stoic or... @...a Wallflower."
^"and I don't... say... what I think about all..."
^Isaac looks pained trying to speak as much as he is.
^"Because I was... not social... not eating... not... here?"
^Man, Isaac really does have trouble expressing himself. I guess I never notice when his boyfriends always around him.
^And he came to Sunflower House to improve himself, but still isn't any better. How should I help him?

c: ^ You give Isaac advice to improve himself, using your own Awareness of your life, as an example.
^You try to motivate Isaac to improve himself with your impassioned Expression.
^With your heightened Grace, You know you need to just give Isaac time to collect himself.
^You try to complement Isaac, and placate his fears with Grace.

Relationships: ^I sit in silence as time passes, letting Isaac recompose himself.
^Wow, I don't think I've ever seen Isaac that vocally impassioned. And he seemed angry... at Eduardo?
^] "Is there something going on with you and Eduardo?"
^"He... he's around me so often and I..."
^"I... I should like that...@ I don't.... @I don't..."
^Isaac curls up even further into his ball.
^He seems to be running himself in circles over his conflicted feelings on Eduardo.

c: ^<color=color_descriptor>You try give Isaac some relationship advice, based on your limited experiences, and what you've seen in media.</color>

Faulty: ^I should probably let Isaac work through his thoughts on his own.
^"they said so too.... that I was broken."
^"Broken 'cause I was quiet. Broken 'cause I didn't want... and..."
^"Don't want what they said was wanted."
^"Don't need what they said was needed."
^"don't want to change. @who I am. @to be happy."
^"... I, uh, spend a lot of time. In my head."
^Isaac's blushing quite a lot at that admission.
^"I... um... don't really... tell people that."
^"but... the Eduardo in my head... and the one out here are..."
^"Eduardo's presence. his constant attention. In my head... I like that."
^"He's around me all the time... @Talking all the time."
^"He showers me with affection. It was all I wanted. But..."
^"Now... that I have it... I can't stand it..."
^"...I really am a broken human being. huh?"
GivenUp: ^I head off, leaving Isaac to stew in his hideaway.
^Something seems to be eating him, but I suppose I've tried to lend an ear.

b: ^Maybe I should try hanging out with him earlier in the week. that might work.

HelpfulListener: ^] "Isaac, you are a wonderful person, and you deserve to be happy."
^"and everything you're feeling, just because I or, Eduardo, or anybody can't fully understand it, doesn't mean its not valid."
^"And if you're not happy with Isaac, you gotta tell him, man. people ain't psychic, Eduardo especially."
^"and... thanks. for, uh, letting me ramble."
^I help Isaac up off the ground.
^"I am gunna talk to Eduardo about... all this sometime soon."
^] "That sounds good. I'll be looking forward to hearing how it goes."
^Isaac  quickly excuses himself after that, slinking off to bed.
^I feel that went well. At the very least, I now know what's been eating Isaac. Hopefully Eduardo can handle it without making a mess of things.
^Maybe I should find a time to chat with Eduardo about their relationship.

b: ^I should be able to articulate Isaac's feelings now, and any issues there in, with Eduardo.

HelpfulListener: ^I Get up off the ground and decide to head inside myself, because it is cold tonight.
Recoil: ^As I keep talking, rambling really, I notice Isaac has once again gone unresponsive.
^] "hey, uh, is any of this helping."
^I keep talking to Isaac for a while longer, but I don't feel like anything I'm saying is helpful.
^after a while, Isaac asks to leave, and we part ways. the biting cold of the night nips at my face.
^I guess I screwed that up? I feel like I did, anyways.
^Maybe I should've let Isaac talk more...
^hindsight on the situation improves your Grace mildly.
^<color=color_descriptor>However, the hindsight also increases your <color=color_wellbeing_penalty>depression<color=color_descriptor> slightly as well.</color>
^[Voices] "You really can't do anything right, can you?"
^I head back inside. my head low from my failure...
Recap: ^I know where Isaac is hiding, and I know what I can say to help him.
^Should I just go through and do everything I did before, or try something new?

c: ^I go to Isaac's little hideaway, and talk him through his issues just like last time.
